sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xu 虛② , depletion. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 29: 凡諸虛疾，水穀沉結流離 者，當灸腹背宜多，不可過百壯 , “For all types of depletion ailments , when water and grain (i.e. liquid and solid foo
d) sink deep in the body and form nodes, or when they flow away or dissipate, it is appropriate to cauterize the abdomen and back many times, but not more than a hundred times”.
